title: Atyochorion
description: An ancient settlement in Phrygia on the Maeander river that was known to have sanctuaries dedicated to Apollo Lairmenos and to Zeus Trossou. It was probably located at or near modern Akkent in Çal, Turkey.

properties.description: FIndspot of inscription published in Akinci Öztürk 2015. Location based on OpenStreetMap.
properties.title: OSM Location of modern Akkent
